remarks: A linear combination of a subset of a linear subspace is also contained in the linear subspace.  (Contributed by AV, 20-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 28-Jul-2019.)
statement: lincellss $p |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ S e. ( LSubSp ` M ) /\ V C_ S ) -> ( ( F e. ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) ^m V ) /\ F finSupp ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) ) -> ( F ( linC ` M ) V ) e. S ) ) $.
